lead_paragraph: Thirty wry old-timers are impressive raconteurs in this documentary directed by Alex Fegan, released during the centenary of the Easter Rising.

headline.print_headline: Review: In ‘Older Than Ireland,’ Centenarians Recall Early and Latter Days
headline.main: Review: In ‘Older Than Ireland,’ Centenarians Recall Early and Latter Days

snippet: Thirty wry old-timers are impressive raconteurs in this documentary directed by Alex Fegan, released during the centenary of the Easter Rising.
abstract: Andy Webster reviews Alex Fegan documentary film Older Than Ireland.
